channel.title: Shop Npc's problem

item.title: Shop Npc's problem
item.dc:creator: @99skiller99 99skiller99
item.description:
@99skiller99 wrote:

Okay, well look. I have npc’s, I have shops, I have certain npc’s for certain shops. But, for some reason, when I spawn the npc, I can’t open up the shop, and yes, they are in the case 17: second click npcs and all that, yes, there’s wanneShop = blah blah. and they are in the if (NPC == 632) bull.

Example:

shop = 2	Aubury's_Rune_Store				2	2	554	50000
} else if (NPCID == 553) {
				// Aubury rune shop
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 2; // Aubury Magic Shop

No, they are not in the same place :).
The shop won’t open for anything!

Read full topic
